original_text: No one has gone up to heaven and then come back. No one has held the wind in his hands. No one has tied his coat around the seas. No one has fixed the borders of the earth. If anyone has done this, tell me his name. Tell me his son's name. Tell me, if you know.
korean_text: 하늘에 올라갔다가 내려온 자가 누구인지, 바람을 그 장중에 모은 자가 누구인지, 물을 옷에 싼 자가 누구인지, 땅의 모든 끝을 정한 자가 누구인지, 그의 이름이 무엇인지, 그의 아들의 이름이 무엇인지 너는 아느냐

sentences.original_text: No one has gone up to heaven
No one has held the wind in his hands
No one has tied his coat around the seas
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 바다를 자기 옷으로 두르지 못했네

sentences.original_text: No one has fixed the borders of the earth

sentences.korean_translation: 만약 이런 일을 한 사람이 있다면
